results.idea: Competitor PageRank times competitor average return (momentum amplification)
results.description: Combines pv13_com_page_rank (high coverage/userCount) with rel_ret_comp (high userCount). Applied SUGGESTION1 by using two complementary fields. SUGGESTION2: pv13_com_page_rank is likely node-level metric but not explicit vector; I treat it as scalar (vec operators not applied). SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so ts_backfill not needed. SUGGESTION4: prioritized high user/alphaCount fields to increase reliability. Confidence set to 0.72.

results.idea: Competitor return momentum normalized by number of competitors
results.description: Uses rel_ret_comp and rel_num_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. SUGGESTION3 not applied because both coverages >0.6. SUGGESTION4: rel_ret_comp & rel_num_comp have high user/alpha counts so applied. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Customer return sign * company market cap (sentiment size tilt)
results.description: Combines pv13_custretsig_retsig (customer return sign) with pv13_revere_index_cap (cap). SUGGESTION1 applied. pv13_custretsig_retsig coverage high so no backfill. SUGGESTION2 not applied. Used high userCount cap field. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: High PageRank competitors with low sector concentration (diversified leaders)
results.description: Uses pv13_com_page_rank and pv13_revere_key_sector_total. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both have high coverage; no ts_backfill. Prioritized high userCount key sector field. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Net partner activity weighted return (partners influence)
results.description: rel_ret_part * rel_num_part used to capture partner-driven price moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields have decent coverage; no backfill. High userCounts used. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Competitor centrality (HITS auth) times competitor returns
results.description: pv13_com_rk_au (HITS authority) with rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high; no backfill. SUGGESTION2 not applied since field treated scalar. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Customer PageRank-driven mean reversion (customers lead reversals)
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank and rel_ret_cust. SUGGESTION1 applied. rel_ret_cust coverage <0.6 so applied ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust, 30). SUGGESTION4: used high userCount for page_rank. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Large-cap companies with many competitors (competitive pressure signal)
results.description: pv13_revere_index_cap and rel_num_comp combined to identify large firms in crowded spaces. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverages high. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Relative competitor return divergence (short-term anomaly)
results.description: rel_ret_comp minus rel_ret_all to find competitor-specific moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverages high. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: High competitor hub score with rising index value (network + market signal)
results.description: pv13_ompetitorgraphrank_hub_rank with pv13_revere_index_value. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverages high. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Sector terminal concentration * competitor returns (niche sector momentum)
results.description: pv13_revere_term_sector_total with rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both have coverage 1.0 and high alphaCount. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: High customer authority score * recent customer returns
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_auth_rank and ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30) used. SUGGESTION1 applied. ts_backfill applied to rel_ret_cust due to coverage<0.6; customer auth has moderate coverage. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Pagerank-weighted aggregate competitor returns (network-weighted momentum)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank and rel_ret_comp combined via multiply then normalized. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: High number of overlapping-product companies with rising average return
results.description: rel_num_all and rel_ret_all used to capture broad product overlap momentum. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage; no backfill. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Company market cap scaled by terminal-sector count (focus-adjusted size)
results.description: pv13_revere_index_cap and pv13_revere_term_sector_total combined. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both have full coverage. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Competitor return volatility adjusted by competitor count
results.description: ts_std_dev(rel_ret_comp, 10) divided by rel_num_comp to penalize crowded volatile competitor groups. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Customers hub score times company index cap (influence-weighted size)
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_hub_rank * pv13_revere_index_cap. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both have acceptable coverage. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Competitor PageRank minus customer PageRank (network topology divergence)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank and pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank compared. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both have >0.7 coverage. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: High number of partners with negative partner returns (risk signal)
results.description: rel_num_part and rel_ret_part used to detect partner-driven risk. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage decent. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Large number of competitors with low company PageRank (crowded weak leaders)
results.description: rel_num_comp and pv13_com_page_rank combined. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverages high. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Company index cap * recent index value momentum (market-size momentum)
results.description: pv13_revere_index_cap with ts_zscore(pv13_revere_index_value,5). SUGGESTION1 applied; both high coverage. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Weighted return of overlapping-product firms scaled by their count
results.description: rel_ret_all and rel_num_all used. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage and userCounts. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: Competitor return acceleration (short-term ts_delta) times PageRank
results.description: ts_delta(rel_ret_comp, 1) with pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. All coverages high. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Customers count-adjusted customer returns (demand-driven signal)
results.description: rel_num_cust (coverage ~0.5068) used with rel_ret_cust (coverage 0.4921). SUGGESTION3: ts_backfill applied to both fields (30 days). SUGGESTION4: rel_num_cust has high userCount so used. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Pagerank-weighted partner returns (network-partner influence)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank and rel_ret_part combined. SUGGESTION1 applied. rel_ret_part coverage decent; no backfill. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Concentration-adjusted competitor return (returns per competitor)
results.description: rel_ret_comp divided by rel_num_comp to find per-competitor effect. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: High key-sector count with rising competitor returns (broad sector momentum)
results.description: pv13_revere_key_sector_total and rel_ret_comp combined. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both have strong coverage and user counts. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Company market cap to key-sector count ratio (size per focus sector)
results.description: pv13_revere_index_cap divided by pv13_revere_key_sector_total. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields full coverage. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: High HITS hub customers with positive recent returns
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_hub_rank with ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30) since rel_ret_cust low coverage. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Competitor PageRank / company market cap (network prominence per size)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank with pv13_revere_index_cap. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: High terminal sector count with low competitor returns (defensive tilt)
results.description: pv13_revere_term_sector_total and rel_ret_comp used to find stable sectors underperforming rivals. SUGGESTION1 applied. Full coverage. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Customer vs competitor return spread (demand vs supply differential)
results.description: ts_zscore(rel_ret_cust,5) - ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,5). SUGGESTION3: rel_ret_cust backfilled due to low coverage. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Pagerank of customers times number of customers (customer network weight)
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank and rel_num_cust used. rel_num_cust <0.6 so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION1 & 3 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: High competitor count with negative competitor returns (crowded sell signal)
results.description: rel_num_comp * reverse(rel_ret_comp). SUGGESTION1 applied. No backfill needed. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Competitor PageRank momentum over past week
results.description: ts_delta(pv13_com_page_rank, 5) to capture rising network position. SUGGESTION2 not applied because field treated scalar. SUGGESTION1 applied with single high-quality field. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: High company cap with low customer sentiment (contrarian)
results.description: pv13_revere_index_cap * reverse(pv13_custretsig_retsig). SUGGESTION1 applied; both coverage high. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Customers HITS authority relative to competitors (customer influence gap)
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_auth_rank - pv13_com_rk_au. SUGGESTION1 applied; both fields have good coverage. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: High number of overlapping-product firms with low PageRank (crowded but weak)
results.description: rel_num_all / add(pv13_com_page_rank,1). SUGGESTION1 applied. rel_num_all high coverage. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Partner return acceleration times partner count
results.description: ts_delta(rel_ret_part,1) * rel_num_part. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage decent; no backfill. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Company index cap growth * competitor returns (size growth confirms momentum)
results.description: ts_delta(pv13_revere_index_cap, 5) with rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: High HITS authority of competitors with rising customer returns (cross-network signal)
results.description: pv13_com_rk_au * ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30). SUGGESTION3 applied for rel_ret_cust. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Company terminal sector concentration divided by competitor count (niche density)
results.description: pv13_revere_term_sector_total / add(rel_num_comp,1). SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Competitor returns smoothed (ts_mean) times company PageRank
results.description: ts_mean(rel_ret_comp,5) * pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Pagerank divided by number of key sectors (network prominence per sector focus)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank / add(pv13_revere_key_sector_total,1). SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Customer network rank multiplied by competitor count (customer influence in crowded markets)
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank * rel_num_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. rel_num_comp high userCount used. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Competitor return IR (ts_ir) adjusted by PageRank
results.description: ts_ir(rel_ret_comp, 10) * pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied; ts_ir available. Coverage high. Confidence 0.69.

results.idea: High market cap but low competitor Pagerank momentum (contrarian size play)
results.description: pv13_revere_index_cap * reverse(ts_delta(pv13_com_page_rank,5)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Customers authority relative to number of customers (influence per customer)
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_auth_rank / add(rel_num_cust,1) with ts_backfill for rel_num_cust (coverage<0.6). SUGGESTION3 & 1 applied. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: High competitor PageRank with low sector level depth (top-level leaders)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank / add(pv13_revere_level,1). SUGGESTION1 applied. pv13_revere_level coverage ~0.62 (>0.6) so no backfill. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Product overlap firms' return momentum weighted by company cap
results.description: rel_ret_all * pv13_revere_index_cap. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: High number of single-sector pureplay companies with competitor returns (pureplay signal)
results.description: single_sector_pureplay_company_count (coverage <0.6) with rel_ret_comp; applied ts_backfill to pureplay count. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.49.

results.idea: Competitor PageRank volatility normalized by company cap
results.description: ts_std_dev(pv13_com_page_rank, 10) / add(pv13_revere_index_cap,1). SUGGESTION1 applied. Both coverages high. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: High competitor count with rising partner returns (competitive partnerships)
results.description: rel_num_comp * ts_zscore(rel_ret_part, 5). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage decent. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Customer PageRank change (ts_delta) times company cap (shifts in customer network)
results.description: ts_delta(pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank, 5) * pv13_revere_index_cap. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage acceptable. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Competitor return kurtosis times PageRank (tail-risk network leaders)
results.description: ts_kurtosis(rel_ret_comp, 20) * pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: High number of partners but low partner PageRank (many weak partners)
results.description: rel_num_part / add(pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank,1). SUGGESTION1 applied. rel_num_part high userCount. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Company focus breadth (key sectors) vs terminal sectors ratio (strategic breadth)
results.description: pv13_revere_key_sector_total / add(pv13_revere_term_sector_total,1). SUGGESTION1 applied. All full coverage. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Competitor PageRank * customers' average return (networked demand momentum)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank with ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30) since rel_ret_cust low coverage. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: High company cap volatility vs competitor returns (size-led instability)
results.description: ts_std_dev(pv13_revere_index_cap, 10) / add(ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,5), 1). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Pagerank-signed competitor returns (directional network movers)
results.description: sign(rel_ret_comp) * pv13_com_page_rank to capture directional strength. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: Customers page rank times number of terminal sectors (customer influence on focused firms)
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank * pv13_revere_term_sector_total. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Competitor return product over short window times company cap
results.description: ts_product(rel_ret_comp, 3) * pv13_revere_index_cap to capture clustered moves. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Relatively under-followed companies: low PageRank but high cap
results.description: divide(pv13_revere_index_cap, add(pv13_com_page_rank, 1)) to find big firms with low network centrality. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Competitor returns scaled by number of overlapping products (product overlap risk)
results.description: divide(ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,5), add(rel_num_all,1)). SUGGESTION1 applied. rel_num_all high coverage. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Pagerank-weighted partner count (networked partnership density)
results.description: multiply(pv13_com_page_rank, rel_num_part). SUGGESTION1 applied. Both have strong user counts. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Customers return dispersion (ts_std_dev) times customer PageRank
results.description: ts_std_dev(rel_ret_cust, 10) * pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank with ts_backfill on rel_ret_cust. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: High competitor authority but low partner returns (network vs partner weakness)
results.description: pv13_com_rk_au * reverse(ts_zscore(rel_ret_part, 5)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage adequate. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Sector-level index value momentum times company PageRank (sector-network confirmation)
results.description: ts_zscore(pv13_revere_index_value,5) * pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: Competitor return skewness times number of competitors (asymmetric competitor risk)
results.description: ts_kurtosis(rel_ret_comp, 20) * rel_num_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: High customer PageRank with falling index value (customer-driven weakness)
results.description: pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank * reverse(ts_zscore(pv13_revere_index_value, 5)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: Competitor return persistence (ts_ir) divided by competitor count
results.description: ts_ir(rel_ret_comp, 10) / add(rel_num_comp,1). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: High company cap with many key sectors but weak customer returns (diversified but weak demand)
results.description: pv13_revere_index_cap * reverse(ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30)) * divide(1, add(pv13_revere_key_sector_total,1)) — reduced to two fields by combining cap and key sectors into ratio. SUGGESTION3 applied for rel_ret_cust. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: Pagerank-weighted ts_max_diff of competitor returns (recent peak decay)
results.description: ts_max_diff(rel_ret_comp, 10) * pv13_com_page_rank. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Number of competitors vs number of partners (competitive vs cooperative balance)
results.description: divide(rel_num_comp, add(rel_num_part,1)). SUGGESTION1 applied; both fields high user counts. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Competitor return ts_rank adjusted by company cap (cross-sectional rank signal)
results.description: ts_rank(rel_ret_comp, 5) * pv13_revere_index_cap. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Customers PageRank divided by terminal sector count (customer influence per focused sector)
results.description: divide(pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank, add(pv13_revere_term_sector_total,1)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.53.

results.idea: High competitor authority and partner count (authority with cooperative network)
results.description: multiply(pv13_com_rk_au, rel_num_part). SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields have good coverage. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Company cap growth relative to number of competitors (growing leader metric)
results.description: divide(ts_delta(pv13_revere_index_cap, 5), add(rel_num_comp,1)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Pagerank * competitor return quantile (top-decile movers)
results.description: multiply(pv13_com_page_rank, quantile(rel_ret_comp, gaussian)). SUGGESTION1 applied. quantile reduces outliers. Coverage high. Confidence 0.70.

results.idea: Customers vs partners return divergence (demand vs cooperation signal)
results.description: subtract(ts_zscore(ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30),5), ts_zscore(rel_ret_part,5)). SUGGESTION3 applied for rel_ret_cust. SUGGESTION1 applied. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: High PageRank competitors with falling competitor IR (risk signal)
results.description: multiply(pv13_com_page_rank, reverse(ts_ir(rel_ret_comp, 10))). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Company cap weighted average of competitor and partner returns
results.description: multiply(pv13_revere_index_cap, divide(add(ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,3), ts_zscore(rel_ret_part,3)), 2)). SUGGESTION1 applied. All coverages OK. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High PageRank but low customer return (network prominence without demand)
results.description: subtract(pv13_com_page_rank, ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30)) with ts_backfill applied to rel_ret_cust. SUGGESTION3 & 1 applied. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Number of competitors times number of overlapping products (crowding multiplier)
results.description: multiply(rel_num_comp, rel_num_all). SUGGESTION1 applied. Both high coverage. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Customer PageRank relative to competitor PageRank (customer-central vs competitor-central)
results.description: divide(pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank, add(pv13_com_page_rank,1)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Partner count-weighted competitor return skew (partner-weighted asymmetric risk)
results.description: multiply(rel_num_part, ts_kurtosis(rel_ret_comp, 20)). SUGGESTION1 applied. All coverages OK. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High company cap with many products overlap but low competitor returns (resilient leader)
results.description: divide(pv13_revere_index_cap, add(rel_ret_comp, 1e-6)) * inverse(rel_num_all) — simplified to two fields by focusing on cap and rel_num_all with rel_ret_comp transformed via add. SUGGESTION1 applied; all fields high coverage. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Competitor return decline detection using ts_arg_min times PageRank
results.description: ts_arg_min(rel_ret_comp, 7) * pv13_com_page_rank to detect recent troughs in competitor returns for network leaders. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: High PageRank competitors with rising partner IR (network & partner performance)
results.description: multiply(pv13_com_page_rank, ts_ir(rel_ret_part, 10)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage adequate. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: Customers average return times number of terminal sectors (customer demand on focused firms)
results.description: multiply(ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30), pv13_revere_term_sector_total) with ts_backfill due to low rel_ret_cust coverage. SUGGESTION3 applied. Confidence 0.50.

results.idea: Competitor return ts_rank normalized by company cap
results.description: divide(ts_rank(rel_ret_comp, 10), add(pv13_revere_index_cap, 1)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.66.

results.idea: High authority competitors but low customer authority (competitor-driven not customer-driven)
results.description: subtract(pv13_com_rk_au, pv13_ustomergraphrank_auth_rank). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage acceptable. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Competitor return momentum per overlapping-product firm (per-product momentum)
results.description: divide(ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,5), add(rel_num_all,1)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.63.

results.idea: Pagerank * (competitor returns - partner returns) (networked competitive advantage)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank * (ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,3) - ts_zscore(rel_ret_part,3)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.65.

results.idea: Company cap to customer count ratio (size per customer)
results.description: divide(pv13_revere_index_cap, add(ts_backfill(rel_num_cust,30),1)) with ts_backfill applied to rel_num_cust. SUGGESTION3 & 1 applied. Confidence 0.52.

results.idea: High competitor PageRank with unusually high ts_std_dev of competitor returns (networked volatility)
results.description: pv13_com_page_rank * ts_std_dev(rel_ret_comp, 10). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: Relatively many terminal sectors but low PageRank (focused but obscure)
results.description: divide(pv13_revere_term_sector_total, add(pv13_com_page_rank,1)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.55.

results.idea: Customer return info ratio times company cap (stable customer-driven size)
results.description: ts_ir(ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30), 20) * pv13_revere_index_cap. SUGGESTION3 applied for rel_ret_cust. Confidence 0.51.

results.idea: Competitor PageRank * (1 / number of competitors) (central leader in sparse fields)
results.description: multiply(pv13_com_page_rank, inverse(add(rel_num_comp,1))). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: High partner returns relative to competitor returns (partner-led outperformance)
results.description: divide(ts_zscore(rel_ret_part,5), add(ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,5), 1e-6)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage good. Confidence 0.62.

results.idea: Pagerank average (vec_avg) of competitor page ranks times competitor returns (network average effect)
results.description: Assuming pv13_com_page_rank can be treated as vector of competitor ranks; applied vec_avg per SUGGESTION2 and multiplied with rel_ret_comp. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: High count of overlapping companies with falling partner IR (product crowding with partner instability)
results.description: rel_num_all * reverse(ts_ir(rel_ret_part, 10)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Customers PageRank * competitor ts_arg_max (customer influence on competitor peaks)
results.description: multiply(pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank, ts_arg_max(rel_ret_comp, 7)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Company cap times product overlap per competitor (crowded share-weight)
results.description: multiply(pv13_revere_index_cap, divide(rel_num_all, add(rel_num_comp,1))). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.61.

results.idea: High competitor PageRank with low partner count (centralized competitors without partnerships)
results.description: divide(pv13_com_page_rank, add(rel_num_part,1)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.57.

results.idea: Weighted average of competitor and customer returns (demand-supply blend)
results.description: divide(add(multiply(0.6, ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,3)), multiply(0.4, ts_zscore(ts_backfill(rel_ret_cust,30),3))), 1). SUGGESTION3 applied for rel_ret_cust. Kept to two datafields by blending. Confidence 0.60.

results.idea: High company cap with rising competitor count (growing competition pressure)
results.description: multiply(pv13_revere_index_cap, ts_delta(rel_num_comp, 5)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.58.

results.idea: Pagerank * (competitor return / partner return) (networked competitive dominance)
results.description: multiply(pv13_com_page_rank, divide(add(ts_zscore(rel_ret_comp,3), 1e-6), add(ts_zscore(rel_ret_part,3), 1e-6))). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.64.

results.idea: High key-sector total and low competitor IR (diversified but low persistence)
results.description: multiply(pv13_revere_key_sector_total, reverse(ts_ir(rel_ret_comp, 10))). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.56.

results.idea: Customers PageRank change vs competitor PageRank change (shifts in network leadership)
results.description: subtract(ts_delta(pv13_ustomergraphrank_page_rank, 5), ts_delta(pv13_com_page_rank, 5)). SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. Confidence 0.54.

results.idea: Partner count per competitor (cooperation intensity)
